dmca.title: Search Engine Optimizers Use Content, Receive 512
dmca.body:
Beyond ink

NEW MEDIA PUBLIC RELATIONS

www.beyondink.com

November 25, 2003

DMCA Infringement Notification to Google

1) Misuse of Copyrighted Material

The copyrighted work at issue is indexed within Google Web Search, which has been duplicated a number of domains duplicate content and within an interlinking structure owned by the same person/company. Primarily, the pages listed below contain PowerPoint presentation slides from (JupiterMedia's SES Conference in San Jose, August 2003) copyrighted to myself ([Private]) and my company (Beyond Ink, LLC) in their entirety, reproduced without my direct consent or that of JupiterMedia, and are in no way identified as my intellectual property. Additionally, some other presentations and portions of others' copyrighted slides, as well as white papers from other companies do appear on various pages of the domains listed below, also without proper attribution.

http://www.search-engine-marketing-sem.com/SearchEngineMarketing/SEM22.htm
http://www.actonvision.com/Search_Engine_Optimization/SEM22.htm
http://www.internet-marketing-branding.com/Search_Engine_Optimization/SEM22.htm
http://www.free-emarketing-hosting.com/SearchEngineMarketing/SEM22.htm
http//www.searchengine-marketing-optimization.com/SearchEngineMarketing/SEM22.htm
http://www.searchengine-marketing.net/SearchEngineMarketing/SEM22.htm

2) Example of Materials Found in Search Results
   Search Query: Major Directories
		Directory Listing Goals
		Dealing with the Top Directories
		Sub-Domains vs. Sub-Directories
		Multiple Listings & Deep-Links
		Submitting to Directories
   Infringing Pages: 
http://www.search-engine-marketing-sem.com/SearchEngineMarketing/SEM22.htm
http://www.actonvision.com/Search_Engine_Optimization/SEM22.htm
Plus all copies listed above.

   Search Query: dayparts 
   Infringing Page http://dayparts.hypermart.net 
        (is copied from: 
http://www.online-publishers.org/internet_dayparts%20_020603.pdf with no attribution to original authors)

   Search Query: Organic SEO
Infringing Pages: 
http://www.search-engine-marketing-sem.com/SearchEngineMarketing/SEM21.htm
	(another example of slides taken from SES San Jose and reproduced without consent/attribution to the author)


3) Contact Information of Original Author
	[Private]
	Email: [Private]@[Private].com
	Mailing Address:
	PO BOX [Private]
	Portland, Maine 04112-7876
	Phone: [Private]
	Fax: [Private]

4) Contact Information of Owner/Administrator of Infringing Website(s)

[Private]
Email: [Private]@[Private].com
Fax: [Private]
[Private] Ave
Corona Del Mar, California 92628
United States

5) I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6) I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Signed,

[Private]

Faxed: November 25, 2003 to: 
	 Google, Inc
	 [Private], of ActonVision
	 [Private], Esquire

Printed Copy Mailed to:

 Google, Inc.
 Attn: Customer Support, DCMA Complaints
 [Private] Pkwy
 Mountain View, CA 094943
